actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend the Revised Statutes of the United States to permit any Federal officer or employee to waive the receipt of any portion of his/her compensation.

summary.text: Authorizes any Federal officer or employee and Members of Congress, to waive the receipt of any portion of his compensation. (Amends 31 U.S.C. 665(b))

titles.title: A bill to amend the Revised Statutes of the United States to permit any Federal officer or employee to waive the receipt of any portion of his/her compensation.
